questions.question: Should this LangGraph meta-repo be a standalone repository, or integrated into your existing ClaudeAgents repository?

options.label: Standalone LangGraphWorkflows repo
options.description: Separate repository just for LangGraph workflows, independent of ClaudeAgents

options.label: Integrate into ClaudeAgents repo
options.description: Add langgraph/ directory to existing ClaudeAgents meta-repository

questions.question: What scope should the initial implementation cover?

options.label: Phase 0 POC only (one gate)
options.description: Start with proof of concept - implement single gate to validate approach and measure cost savings

options.label: Full PRP workflow (all 6 gates)
options.description: Complete implementation of entire execute-prp workflow with all gates, retry logic, circuit breakers

options.label: All three workflows (draft/generate/execute)
options.description: Implement draft-prp, generate-prp, and execute-prp workflows in LangGraph

questions.question: Which extension pattern should the base infrastructure support?

options.label: Inheritance pattern
options.description: Python class-based inheritance (BasePRPWorkflow → OrgCashPRPWorkflow)

options.label: Configuration-driven
options.description: YAML configuration with extends/overrides for gates and thresholds

options.label: Plugin system
options.description: Auto-discovery of plugins from project .claude/langgraph/plugins/

questions.question: Should the deployment script integrate with your existing /update-project command?

options.label: Integrate with /update-project
options.description: Extend existing update-project command to also deploy LangGraph workflows

options.label: Separate deployment command
options.description: Create new /deploy-langgraph or similar dedicated command
